lead_paragraph: LIPSON--Norman, passed peacefully at his home in Sarasota, Florida on July 7 at age 88. Beloved husband of Linda for 28 years, he had two wonderful marriages. His first wife, Charlotte (Shai), passed away in 1988. Devoted father of Eileen Lipson, and June and Michael Cohen, loving grandfather of Paul and Ceci Sirota, Amy and Aaron Katz, Nikki Cohen, and Stephanie Cohen. Adored great grandfather of Tyler, Jake, Dylan, Aria and Nash. He will be remembered for his kindness, jokes, and loving manner. Private services will be held in Sarasota. 1/3
